text: Hi <@U01QVR44MEY> - not having much luck with that syntax, despite Success 200 and Content-Type application/json. HubSpot still showing action failed. Can I DM you the mock responder in case you can see any difference from your working button responder?
For future reference, the mock responder wasn't setup to handle POST requests and the button click triggers a post request

Hello <@U01QVR44MEY>, I've already tried this workaround but so far, HubSpot is not recognizing it as action button if I try to add action button at the bottom of the card.  It would be good if any another solutions/ workaround possible to show data in iframe on clicking ViewAll Link which is to be there at the end of CRM Card while not at end of each records of CRM Cards. I've attached a image of ViewAll button for your reference.

Hello
*Search after create*
following this post here - <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Search-after-create/m-p/329368>

Data is not immediately available after it gets added. Whats a good way to handle this? Currently we just wait, and there should be a better way.
